snippet: A piece by Madison Liew, taken from a 2016 article, “Don’t Let Them Tell You You’re Not at the Center of the Universe,” and a 2008 article, “After Fatal Crashes, Police to Set Up Motorcycle Checkpoints.”
abstract: A piece by Madison Liew, taken from a 2016 article, “Don’t Let Them Tell You You’re Not at the Center of the Universe,” and a 2008 article, “After Fatal Crashes, Police to Set Up Motorcycle Checkpoints.”
